TopicTitle: Time to return window : ... days [AKA] Meanwhile on ...

Articles.Content:
... Duna, Bob does his best impersonation.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LTFFd0fsYjc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

---

**Please share your crews' killing-time moments.**

Happy family photos, exotourism pictures, kerbal towers, EVA stunts and other escapades, anything goes.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-06T15:30:38Z" title="07/06/2015 03:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 6, 2015</time> by Plume & Akakak**
Jeb did backflips on Minmus while he was stuck there until a rescue craft came.

I didn't.... your kerbals have been corrupted my the God (YOU!)

I'd never laugh over a dead body.... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> I didn't.... your kerbals have been corrupted my the God (YOU!)
> I'd never laugh over a dead body.... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

They get funnier the more you see.
Was waiting for him to hop up at the end ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Valentina transformed into the Kraken on a Mun EVA.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/djAa9-8NVZU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

... Duna. Time to *return window* : 167 days.

[![914924KSPstoned01.jpg](http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/914924KSPstoned01.jpg)](http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=914924KSPstoned01.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-06T15:00:13Z" title="07/06/2015 03:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 6, 2015</time> by Plume & Akakak**

My Kerbals sit comfortably in their habitation modules while waiting for the return window, dilligently plugging away at their current save on Human Space Program. No wonder they always have a smile on their faces when I check in on them.
I felt slightly bad for Mr. Hawking at first, but honestly he'd probably get a laugh out of this too xD

... Duna. Time to *return window* : 142 days.

... Duna. Time to *return window* : 121 days.

Bob having an enlightening conversation with the Sun.

[![604141KSPBobconversingwiththesun01.jpg](http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/604141KSPBobconversingwiththesun01.jpg)](http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=604141KSPBobconversingwiththesun01.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-13T13:59:01Z" title="07/13/2015 01:59  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 13, 2015</time> by Plume & Akakak**

Bill, Danble and Erbald having a conversation

on while on a rover tour of Duna. They also played with the magnetic crains, but I can't find those pics. 

[![CTcCVOV.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/CTcCVOV.jpg)](http://imgur.com/CTcCVOV)

Kudos for doing things with your Kerbals rather than just sending them back to space to wait in a pod. Far to many do that.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-14T04:07:44Z" title="07/14/2015 04:07  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 14, 2015</time> by Tw1**

... Duna. Time to *return window* : they don't care right now.

[![502018KSPdunasundown01.jpg](http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/502018KSPdunasundown01.jpg)](http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=502018KSPdunasundown01.jpg)

> 
> Kudos for doing things with your Kerbals rather than just sending them back to space to wait in a pod. Far to many do that.

Thanks for the kind words, Tw1.

I'm more optimistic and think that many people do similar things, but I understand modesty prevents some from sharing such intimate and quite childish games.

Cheers.

> 
> Thanks for the kind words, Tw1.
> 
> I'm more optimistic and think that many people do similar things, but I understand modesty prevents some from sharing such intimate and quite childish games.
> 
> Cheers.

Interesting observation. It seems strange to me, because that human part of space exploration is one of my favourite parts of KSP, and this is a forum dedicated to playing the game. But then, I'm also quite a fan of the sims, so that sort of 'humanness' in video games is not alien to me.
